original_text: And Ahaz slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the city, in Jerusalem, for they did not bring him into the tombs of the kings of Israel. And Hezekiah his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 아하스가 그의 조상들과 함께 누우매 이스라엘 왕들의 묘실에 들이지 아니하고 예루살렘 성에 장사하였더라 그의 아들 히스기야가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Ahaz slept with his fathers
and they buried him in the city
for they did not bring him into the tombs of the kings of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 이스라엘 왕들의 묘실에 들여지지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah his son reigned in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 히스기야가 대신하여 왕이 되니라
